reviews.review: This game is sincerely one of the most addictive games ive ever played. I have around 300 hours on console and just started pc. gameplay is fun overall and both sides are fun to play. With that out of the way, this game fuckin sucks, in fact never play this game.
this game should be free to play !

Dead by Daylight ist für erwachsene Spieler*innen, die Fans des Horror-Genres sind ein guter Multiplayer-Titel. Dead by Daylight ist anfangs für Neulinge etwas herausfordernd, was die Techniken im Spiel angeht, aber die atmosphärischen Ingame-Sounds und der faire Preis machen dies wieder wett. Ich persönlich kann Dead by Daylight nur empfehlen!

after 5 years of playing this game on and off unfortunately its time to permanently put it down. Dead by Daylight has had its fair share of ups and downs and ultimately the game has gotten better over the years that is untill the Developers decided to add skill based match making. dont get me wrong SBMM is important for a bunch of games but DBD is not one of those games. it feels like the Devs want to make the game E-sports viable when ultimately its not a E-sports type of game you cant balance well enough. Before without SBMM you would get games where you get destroyed games where you Demolish the others and games that are evenly matched and it was good lots of variety. now its somewhat safer for new players but even then new players still get matched with red ranks from time to time (which was on of the issues this was supposed to prevent) and the more you play you will realise it becomes sweatfest after sweatfest after sweatfest which i dont know who enjoys. and i can tell you from experience that sweaty games arent fun (neither are pubstomps but thats another topic) the game will make you want to rip your hair out no matter how calm and collected you are. DBD was alot of fun before and now with SBMM those fun games are few and far between so i cant in good conscience recommend this game to potential buyers anymore. I hope there will be a time when i can take this review down and recommend to people again but for now we will have to wait and see.

我想说的是：其实只要是竞技游戏，不管什么类型，只要涉及到输赢，那你玩游戏的体验和乐趣肯定就不仅仅是游戏玩法本身了（更多时候会取决于你自己的发挥和队友，不是吗？）所以，朋友玩游戏心态一定要好，即便做不了游戏的最强王者，但你一定要做生活的最强王者！

I really enjoy this game, the different styles of play from killer and survivor give me a lot of adaptability with play-styles. I wholeheartedly recommend this game, it does have bugs but they are not game breaking. The issues i do have with the game is the grind but its also something i enjoy and the 2 newest killers released were extremely weak at launch. I'm halfway done with the perks of survivors and have barely started with the killers. I've got a long grind to go but i really enjoy the game and the new killers, survivors and perks added in allow so much new events and occurrences that it never gets boring. Really looking forward to seeing where this game goes from here.
